description: The Wimbledon Championships, commonly known simply as Wimbledon or The Championships, is the oldest tennis tournament in the world and is widely regarded as the most prestigious.  It has been held at the All England Club in Wimbledon, London since 1877 and is played on outdoor grass courts, with retractable roofs over the two main courts since 2019. The 135th edition is scheduled to take place between June 27, and July 10, 2022.

markets.description:
The Wimbledon Championships, commonly known simply as Wimbledon or The Championships, is the oldest tennis tournament in the world and is widely regarded as the most prestigious.  It has been held at the All England Club in Wimbledon, London since 1877 and is played on outdoor grass courts, with retractable roofs over the two main courts since 2019. The 135th edition is scheduled to take place between June 27, and July 10, 2022.

This is a market on whether Rafael Nadal will play at least one point in the 2022 Wimbledon Championships Men's Singles Tournament. 

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Nadal plays at least one point. For example, if Nadal wins one point during a match in the 2022 Wimbledon Championships and the score is 15-0, or loses one point and the score is 0-15, then this will suffice to resolve the market to "Yes.". The market cannot resolve to "Yes" until Nadal has actually played a point. 

This market will resolve to “No” if the first round of the 2022 Wimbledon Championships starts and Rafael Nadal is not listed as a participant in any matches. If Nadal is listed as a participant but does not play a single point, the market will also resolve to "No".

If the 2022 Wimbledon Championships have not started by July 11, 2022, (12:00 PM ET), this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the organisers (presently found at https://www.wimbledon.com/), however credible media sources will also suffice.
markets.question: Will Rafael Nadal play in the 2022 Wimbledon?

markets.description:
The Wimbledon Championships, commonly known as 'The Championships' or simply 'Wimbledon', is the oldest tennis tournament in the world and is widely regarded as the most prestigious. It has been held at the All England Club in Wimbledon, London since 1877 and is played on outdoor grass courts. There have been retractable roofs over the two main courts since 2019. The 135th edition is scheduled to take place between June 27, and July 10, 2022. 

This is a market about the winner of the Men’s Singles category of the 2022 Wimbledon Championships, in which Novak Djokovic is the three-time defending champion.

The market will resolve to “Yes” if Novak Djokovic wins the 2022 Wimbledon Championships Men's Singles tournament. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. If the winner is not known by July 17, 2022, (12:00 PM ET), this market will resolve to 50-50.

If at any point it becomes impossible for Novak Djokovic to win in Men's Singles based on the rules of The Championships, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source will be official information from Wimbledon (https://www.wimbledon.com/), however credible reporting may also be used.
markets.groupItemTitle: Will Novak Djokovic win Men's Singles?
markets.question: 2022 Wimbledon Championships: Will Novak Djokovic win Men's Singles?

markets.description:
The Wimbledon Championships, commonly known as 'The Championships' or simply 'Wimbledon', is the oldest tennis tournament in the world and is widely regarded as the most prestigious. It has been held at the All England Club in Wimbledon, London since 1877 and is played on outdoor grass courts. There have been retractable roofs over the two main courts since 2019. The 135th edition is scheduled to take place between June 27, and July 10, 2022. 

This is a market about the winner of the Women’s Singles category of the 2022 Wimbledon Championships. In March 2022 Ashleigh Barty, the reigning champion, announced her retirement from professional tennis. World No. 1 Iga Świątek is entering the tournament on a 35 match winning streak.

This market will resolve to “Yes” if Iga Świątek wins the 2022 Wimbledon Championships Women's Singles tournament. Otherwise, this market will resolve to “No”. If the winner is not known by July 17, 2022, (12:00 PM ET), this market will resolve to 50-50.

If at any point it becomes impossible for Iga Świątek to win in Women's Singles based on the rules of The Championships, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source will be official information from Wimbledon (https://www.wimbledon.com/), however credible reporting may also be used.
markets.groupItemTitle: Will Iga Świątek win Women's Singles?
markets.question: 2022 Wimbledon Championships: Will Iga Świątek win Women's Singles?

markets.description:
The Wimbledon Championships, commonly known as 'The Championships' or simply 'Wimbledon', is the oldest tennis tournament in the world and is widely regarded as the most prestigious. It has been held at the All England Club in Wimbledon, London since 1877 and is played on outdoor grass courts. There have been retractable roofs over the two main courts since 2019. The 135th edition is scheduled to take place between June 27, and July 10, 2022. 

This is a market about the winner of the upcoming match between Maxime Cressy and Jack Sock, scheduled to take place on June 30, 2022, as part of the 2022 Wimbledon Championships.

This market will resolve to "Cressy" if Maxime Cressy beats Jack Sock in the pair's upcoming match scheduled for June 30, 2022, during the 2022 Wimbledon Championships. This market will resolve to "Sock" if Jack Sock beats Maxime Cressy in the pair's upcoming match. If the winner of this match is not known by July 7, 2022, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The primary resolution source will be official information from Wimbledon (https://www.wimbledon.com/), however credible reporting may also be used.
markets.question: 2022 Wimbledon Championships: Maxime Cressy vs Jack Sock

markets.description:
The Wimbledon Championships, commonly known as 'The Championships' or simply 'Wimbledon', is the oldest tennis tournament in the world and is widely regarded as the most prestigious. It has been held at the All England Club in Wimbledon, London since 1877 and is played on outdoor grass courts. There have been retractable roofs over the two main courts since 2019. The 135th edition takes place between June 27, and July 10, 2022. 

This is a market on who will advance after the Men’s Singles match between Novak Djokovic and Jannik Sinner, scheduled for July 5, 8 AM ET.

The market will resolve to “Djokovic” if Novak Djokovic advances or to “Sinner” if Jannik Sinner advances. Please note that the market will resolve to whoever advances, even if the result is a "walkover".

If for any reason the person advancing is not declared by organizers by July 12, 11:59:59 PM ET, the market will resolve 50-50.
markets.groupItemTitle: Who will win Djokovic vs. Sinner?
markets.question: 2022 Wimbledon Championships: Who will win Djokovic vs. Sinner?
